doc.name: Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on Underpayments) Act 1987
doc.citation: Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on Underpayments) Act 1987

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title
chunks.structure_path: Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on Underpayments) Act 1987 > Section 1
chunks.text:
(Assented to 18 December 1987)
  1. This Act may be cited as the Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on
Underpayments) Act 1987.
(Minister's second reading speech made in-
    House of Representatives on 21 October 1987
    Senate on 3 November 1987)
No. 144 of 1987

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement
chunks.structure_path: Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on Underpayments) Act 1987 > Section 2
chunks.text:
2. This Act shall come into operation on the day on which the Petroleum
Resource Rent Tax Assessment Act 1987 comes into operation.
No. 144 of 1987

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of interest charge
chunks.structure_path: Petroleum Resource Rent Tax (Interest on Underpayments) Act 1987 > Section 3
chunks.text:
3. Interest that is payable in accordance with section 65 of the Petroleum
Resource Rent Tax Assessment Act 1987 is imposed by this Act.
